PropertyBag.Description: Contains a list of prices that should be applied for a given effective date.
PropertyBag.Name: PriceSchedule

Property.Description: A collection of time intervals with applicable prices. Each element in this collection is interpreted as prices that are effective on the start date of the element, up to the start date of the next element. For example, a price schedule that looks like this: - 2012-01-01: $50 - 2012-06-01: $45 Should be interpreted as: "Events between January 1st 2012 and May 31st 2012 should be charged at $50. After June 1st 2012 the price to be applied is $45."
Property.Name: Intervals
